description: The agreement, signed in Warsaw, will see some US troops redeployed from Germany to Poland.
title: Pompeo signs deal to redeploy troops from Germany to Poland
title_page: Pompeo signs deal to redeploy troops from Germany to Poland - BBC News
maintext: The new agreement falls well short of this. But it sends a clear signal about Mr Trump's preferences. Muscular Poland, with relatively strong defence spending, is the sort of ally the president likes. By contrast he has already announced the pull-out of some US forces from Germany, which he believes does not carry its share of the defence burden.
